snippet: A trial on Detroit’s plan for erasing debts and remaking city services will be delayed for a week, a federal bankruptcy judge said.
abstract: Federal bankruptcy judge says trial on Detroit’s plan for erasing debts and remaking city services will be delayed for a week.
lead_paragraph: A trial on Detroit’s plan for erasing debts and remaking city services will be delayed for a week, a federal bankruptcy judge said.

headline.main: Michigan: One-Week Delay Ordered in Bankruptcy Trial
headline.print_headline: Michigan: One-Week Delay Ordered in Bankruptcy Trial
